TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit InCallService extends Android.App.Service
Public MustInherit Class InCallService Inherits Service
public ref class InCallService abstract : Android::App::Service

Docs.summary: This service is implemented by an app that wishes to provide functionality for managing phone calls.
